casebody.data:
METALLIC SHAFT COMPANY, Plaintiff Appellant, v. HORTON MANUFACTRING COMPANY, Defendant Appellee. (Circuit Court of Appeals, Second Circuit. March 16, 1925.) No. 260. William G. McKnight, of New York City, for appellant. Melville Church, of Washington, D. C., for appellee.

Before HOUGH, MANTON, and HAND, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

Decree (300 F. 468) affirmed, with costs.
